description.message: Lets you plus [+] any part of the URL and finds the next [>] link

title.description: Extension title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

plus_input.description: Plus input button title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

minus_input.description: Minus input button title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

clear_input.description: Clear input button title (tool tip) when hovered.

setup_input.description: Plus Minus input button title (tool tip) when hovered.

setup_h3.message: Select the part of the URL to plus [+] or minus [-]

oops_error.description: Beginning line of popup error message.

selection_blank_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection is blank.

selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters
selection_notalphanumeric_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection is not alphanumeric.

selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be part of the URL
selection_notinurl_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection is not part of the URL.

selection_base_error.message: Select a higher base to match characters in selection
selection_base_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection doesn't match the base.

selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL
selectionstart_invalid_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selectionStart is invalid.

interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be 1 or higher
interval_invalid_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the interval is 0 or negative.

keyboard_shortcuts_p.message: Keyboard Shortcuts are configured via Chrome. If Quick is enabled, you can Plus [+] or Next [>] instantly without having to enter Setup.

keyboard_shortcuts_p2.message: Note: Chrome keyboard shortcuts have limited key support. You can enable more complete internal keyboard (and mouse button) shortcuts. You'll be prompted to grant URL Plus with additional permissions first in order to use its internal shortcuts script instead.

optional_permissions_request_button.message: Grant Permissions and Enable Internal Shortcuts

internal_shortcuts_p.message: Shortcuts are configured via URL Plus internally. Click on the text boxes and press the key(s) you'd like to set. Any combination of the Alt, Ctrl, Shift, and Meta modifier keys can be used. If Quick is enabled, you can Plus [+] or Next [>] instantly without having to enter setup.

optional_permissions_remove_button.message: Remove Permissions and Disable Internal Shortcuts

plus_minus_settings_p.message: Customize Plus [+] and Minus [-] default settings.

selection_option_prefixes.message: Select numbers in the URL with prefixes like =123 and /456

selection_option_lastnumber.message: Select the last number in the URL

selection_option_custom.message: Use a custom JavaScript regular expression

selection_custom_matchgroup_error.message: Match found, but not in group entered

selection_custom_matchindex_error.message: Match found, but not in index entered

next_prev_settings_p.message: Customize Next [>] and Prev [<] default settings.

links_innerHTML_option.message: Prefer links with words like "Next" in them

same_domain_policy_enable_label.message: Only use links from the same domain of the page
